content: knittinghelp com has a good video tutorial for the ssk and k2tog decreases on their website at http //www knittinghelp com/videos/decreases k2tbl decrease new stitch a day has a good video tutorial for the k2tbl decrease at http //newstitchaday com/knit-two-together-through-the-back-loop/ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pattern sizes small medium large large will fit an average man s hand or a large lady s hand you can easily adjust the size by adding or subtracting stitches in multiples of 4 co 36 40 44 stitches distribute over 3 needles i recommend distributing the stitches in multiples of 4 join being careful not to twist the stitches work in k2 p2 ribbing for 3 3 3 1/2 or as long as you want the cuff to be waum mitts v 3 © tracy hill 2018 2020 2 thumb gusset for additional details on the gusset increases see the tutorial at the end of the pattern work needle 1 and needle 3 in pattern throughout gusset increases if you are knitting on two circulars or magic loop choose a column of knit stitches in which to place your gusset the mitts are the same for the right and left hands so the exact position is not critical needle 2 gusset set-up row k2 p2 k1 pm kll krl pm k1 work in pattern to end next two row k2 p2 k1 sm knit all stitches between markers sm k1 work in pattern to end gusset row 1 k2 p2 k1 sm krl knit all stitches between markers kll sm k1 work in pattern to end gusset row 2 k2 p2 k1 sm knit all stitches between markers sm k1 work in pattern to end gusset row 3 repeat gusset row 2 repeat gusset row 1 - 3 increasing 2 stitches every third row knitting all stitches between the markers until there are 16 18 20 stitches between markers repeat gusset row 2 one more time note after reaching the required number of stitches in gusset row 1 you knit gusset row 2 as normal then slip the gusset stitches to the waste yarn on what would be gusset row 3 effectively skipping gusset row 3 on next row slip the stitches between the markers on to waste yarn removing markers as you come to them co 2 stitches using the backwards loop cast on and continue working in pattern next row work all stitches in pattern knitting the knits and purling the purls there will be 4 knit stitches over the thumb hole next row work all stitches in pattern until you come to the 4 knit stitches over the thumb hole ssk k2tog now reduced to 2 knit stitches continue in pattern waum mitts v 3 © tracy hill 2018 2020 3 work in k2 p2 ribbing pattern for 1 1/2 1 3/4 2 or desired length then bobble loosely in pattern thumb for additional details on how to pick up and decrease stitches for the thumb see the tutorial at the end of the pattern
